articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Assumption of KPA Supreme Commandership Celebrated
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Assumption of KPA Supreme Commandership Celebrated 
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- A meeting of workers and members of trade unions was held at the Central Hall of Workers Tuesday on the first anniversary of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 Hyon Sang Ju, chairman of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK), made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the KPA marked an event of special mention in strengthening and developing the Korean revolutionary armed forces and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Thanks to Kim Jong Un the Songun revolutionary cause, which started on Mt. Paektu along the road indicated by General Secretary Kim Jong Il, is triumphantly advancing, they noted, and continued: 
					
					 Kim Jong Un strengthened the KPA to be scouts and strong mainstay for the Songun revolution and provided original Songun leadership, performing undying exploits in the history of building the revolutionary armed forces of Juche.
					
					 He wisely led the launching of satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 to success, thus demonstrating the overall national power of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's Korea and bringing about a great victory of Songun Korea which brilliantly decorated this significant year.
					
					 The workers and the members of trade unions should become passionate fighters and Songun revolutionary comrades who protect Kim Jong Un politico-ideologically and at the risk of their lives and devotedly implement the line of the party.
